name: sylg
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w2))
-| wi(wal(s0, w2), wal(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w2))
-| wi(wal(s0, w2), wal(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w2), wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w2, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w2))
-| wi(w2, w1)

comment: A syllogism combined with generalization. Inference associated with ~ sylgt . General form of ~ alrimih . (Contributed by BJ, 4-Oct-2019.)
